content:
BatchRequest<TOptions, TResponse> BatchRequest(Of TOptions, TResponse) Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Protocol
Assembly:
Azure.Batch.dll

Represents the information required to make a particular call with no request body to the Batch service REST API.

Edit

In this Article

public class BatchRequest<TOptions, TResponse> : BatchRequestBase<TOptions, TResponse>, IBatchRequest<TResponse>, IBatchRequest where TOptions : IOptions, new ()where TResponse : IAzureOperationResponsePublic Class BatchRequest(Of TOptions As {IOptions, New}, TResponse As IAzureOperationResponse)
    Inherits BatchRequestBase(Of TOptions, TResponse)
    Implements IBatchRequest(Of TResponse), IBatchRequest

Type Parameters

TOptions

The type of the parameters passed outside the request body associated with the request.
TResponse

The response type expected from the request.
